summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4378 for the improvement of 14th Avenue Northeast, from the north line of Sandall's Home Addition to East 80th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, under Ordinance No. 51817, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
